text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn Typical!!! Yes let’s keep on the Chinese Coronavirus! Potus has been giving briefings on the virus constantly! This is news Brain what’s wrong don’t you want the people to hear about what you all have been doing since 2015!!!!!
